backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, travel and monetary event types, access-controlled storage, and functions for saving and fetching user-specific app data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components and hooks used in the application.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML page bootstrapping the frontend and loading the React application entry point.

frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper that shows a login screen when unauthenticated and renders children once the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Generic empty-state component showing an illustration or icon, descriptive text, and an optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users for their name and saving the profile with validation and toast feedback.

frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Indicator showing syncing, synced, or error states with icons and optional time-ago display.

frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password‑protected panel that allows clearing various types of ledger data using confirmation dialogs.

frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides a date range selector using popover calendars, supporting both controlled and context-driven updates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and showing a success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a traveller cash payment with success feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Dialog to confirm deletion of a trip history entry, optionally noting removal of all participation for that date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Form dialog for editing car expense fields with validation and update callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Form dialog to edit a cash payment’s amount, date, and note with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Dialog for updating a traveller’s morning/evening trip participation for a specific date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Dialog wrapper displaying the expense history view for the selected date range.

frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Shows an export button that opens the export report dialog.

Main ledger UI containing tabs, dialogs, date‑range management, and state synchronization.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing full ledger state and all mutation functions backed by local state hooks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar menu for navigating ledger tabs and opening history/export dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MonthYearRa: Selector component for choosing month or year ranges based on date‑range classification.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form to add a traveller’s other pending amount with validation and submission callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallMont: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.

Displays filterable and editable cash payment records in a table with traveller filtering.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Generates per-traveller payment summaries including charges, payments, dues, and co‑traveller totals.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control to view and update the global rate per trip with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Shows per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances for the selected range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: UI for adding, editing, and removing travellers, including balance check before deletion.

frontend/src/features/ledger/TripsPaymen: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Handles periodic syncing of local ledger state with remote backend data, including merging and conflict resolution.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto-toll settings in localStorage with persistence and simple update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Manages full local ledger state with persistence, including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using React Query and an actor client.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and table readability enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App.
Generates monthly, profit/loss, income, and expense reports from ledger data with date‑based aggregation.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Handles exporting, importing, validating, and merging ledger backup data as JSON files.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utilities for building and classifying date ranges and formatting or listing days within a range.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Builds CSV-formatted Excel exports including daily grids, trip totals, and summary calculations.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates various PDF reports by composing HTML from ledger data and selected report types.

frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, and balances within a date range, including weekend and pending logic.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides INR currency formatting and parsing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income from recorded trip data and optional co‑traveller incomes, respecting weekend inclusion rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether dates, especially weekends, should be included or editable based on settings and saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and versioning for the Carpool Ledger app.
